data.title: Pentair reviewed by Australian consumers across 5 listings
data.meta_description: 5 Pentair listings ranked based on 151 reviews - Find consumer reviews on ProductReview.com.au, Australia's No.1 Opinion Site.
data.text:
Not that impressedSetup was easy, well packaged, clear instructions, loks the the bees kness, now First cycle didn't last more than an hour and didn't cover half the pool. Climbing walls was difficult in most cases, it did have approx five att... Read moreempts with only two successful. had trouble with right angle floor to wall joint, and found it difficult on some radiuses wall to floor especially when coming form angle. Pool floor had prevoiusly been vacuumed so no debris to speak of. Will be talking to pool shop tomorrow possibly not a good match. Pool 9.0m x 4.5m B Shape, Pebblecrete and tile at water line.

Not what I hoped it to bePurchased in March 2020 via an online store after seeking their recommendation and the description on their website. The unit was simple to install and setup, and for the last 3 years has been without issue. The "headlines"... Read more describing the unit say 5 yr warranty when in fact the warranty is broken into two portions, 3yr for the system as a whole, and a further 2yrs on the cell. Wish I had read the fine print. After 3 years 3 months the timer stopped keeping time and contact was made with the manufacturer asking them to consider a replacement on good will. Pentair agreed, so I cant fault them in that respect. While the system has been good, the failure of the timer so soon is a big let down. If I have to keep buying replacement OEM timers at $300 ea and electricians to replace the timer $270, it works out to be quite an expensive buy. I think if there are others available to you, look at them before considering the Pentair

Great White II Pool CleanerI purchased the Great White II Pool Cleaner about a month ago, and it has exceeded my expectations! It's FAR better than any of the skirt type cleaners we had previously. It's not perfect, but obviously the longer you run i... Read moret, the more chance it will have of cleaning all areas of the pool. For our pool, it DOES travel to both shallow and deep ends - people that claim otherwise simply do not have it setup correctly, or need to add a length of hose or two. I made a complete torture test video of it for my youtube channel, where it cleaned what was weeks of heavy leaves and massive debris, after our previous cleaner died. Pentair Great White II Pool Cleaner Full Test;https://youtu.be/5bv9lYH2F7E?si=OMmzQS7zzpAXuOsC
